CREATE TABLE game_inventory (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    item_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)
